detectors.description:
AirdropCoin.getTokens() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirdropCoin.sol#179-237) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- msg.value >= requestMinimum && now < deadline && now < round1 && now < round2 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirdropCoin.sol#190)
	- msg.value >= requestMinimum && now < deadline && now > round1 && now < round2 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirdropCoin.sol#198)
	- now >= deadline && now >= round1 && now < round2 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/AirdropCoin.sol#220)
